infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: SnapTallyMobile needs access to your camera to scan price tags.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: SnapTallyMobile needs access to your photo library to select price tag images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: SnapTallyMobile needs your location to determine which store you're shopping at.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow SnapTallyMobile to access your camera to scan price tags.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow SnapTallyMobile to use your location to identify your shopping location.
